price: Nuko itsinda ry’abagenzi (ryarimo abavandimwe ba Yusufu) risohotse mu gihugu (cya Misiri) umubyeyi wabo (Yakobo) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ndumva impumuro ya Yusufu, niba mutari bubyite uburindagizi (kubera izabukuru).”
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
